C++

Tiger Compiler

Compiler using flex, yacc for the parsing. The analysis, detection of errors & back-end are coded in C++.

It compiles Tiger code.

Infinite calculator

Library for computing numbers in any base, of any size (as long as your computer hardware handles it).

A lot of optimisation have been made on the speed of computation.

It uses for the multiplication the Karatsuba algorithm, and for the division both Newton and Ancient Egyptian algorithms.
